description: Kazuma is a master of martial arts who runs a dojo near the Souma family compound, where he teaches several of the younger Soumas, including Kyo Souma, Kagura Souma, Yuki Souma, and Hatsuharu Souma. He is usually addressed as Shishou, meaning "Master".His daily routine is taken care of by his assistant at the dojo, Kunimitsu Tomoda.
name: Souma Kazuma
